hero.title: Digital consent forms for tattoo & piercing studios
hero.subtitle: Compliant. Digital. Simple.

features.headline: Everything studios actually need day to day

items.title: Digital forms
items.text: Tattoo, piercing and other consent forms filled out directly on tablet or smartphone – no paper clutter.

items.title: Legally compliant documentation
items.text: Signatures, PDFs and supporting documents are stored cleanly and securely and can be retrieved at any time in a traceable manner.

items.title: Admin & overview
items.text: All consents, events and customers clearly organized in the admin area – suitable for conventions as well.

usecases.headline: Built for studio days and conventions
usecases.subtitle: TattooMate adapts to your workflow — whether it’s scheduled appointments or a hectic event day.

items.title: Studio mode
items.text: Clean workflows with complete details, checklists and clear documentation — perfect for appointments.

items.title: Event/Convention mode
items.text: Fast walk-in flow: reduced inputs, clear overview and separate capture for events.

items.title: QR codes for forms
items.text: Generate form links as QR codes — ideal for printouts at your booth or at the studio front desk.

event.title: Event / convention mode
event.text: Fast walk-in flow with reduced inputs and clean separation for events.

studio.title: Studio Mode – Overview
studio.text: Classic studio procedure: complete information, clear documentation.

qrcode.title: QR codes for forms
qrcode.text: Form links as QR codes for studios and conventions — perfect for printing.

howto.headline: How it works in the studio
howto.subtitle: In 3 steps – simple, fast, and properly documented.

items.title: Display the QR code
items.text: The client scans it and is taken directly to the form (studio or event).

items.title: Fill out and sign the form
items.text: Everything on smartphone or tablet – including required fields, information texts, and signature.

items.title: PDF available in the admin panel
items.text: The studio can generate the PDF at any time, print it, or save it.

footer.claim: Digital consent forms for tattoo & piercing studios
